a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate in armed conflicts based on where they occurred

Deaths of combatants and civilians due to fighting, per 100,000 people. Included are
interstate
,
intrastate
,

extrasystemic
,
non-state
conflicts, and
one-sided violence
.
